description: I have a natural curiosity for understanding how technologies work, which leads me to recreate existing ideas in my own way. I always respect the original structure and functionality while seeking ways to optimise and improve each project. I am deeply committed to details, valuing every step of the learning and development process.

I adapt existing code and develop custom tools that address specific needs, focusing on efficiency and user experience. I aim to implement new features that bring real value to applications, maintaining a pragmatic and solution-oriented approach. My commitment is to create intuitive and robust software, always respecting the foundational work of the projects I collaborate on.

I develop video projects that combine humour, gameplay, and narrative, creating engaging and original content. I use editing techniques to communicate ideas clearly and captivatingly, adapting the style according to the target audience. Each project is an opportunity to explore creative expression, balancing technique and storytelling.

I constantly explore new tools and technologies as part of my personal development. From developing VS Code extensions to integrating innovative features into existing projects, I enjoy testing experimental approaches, even when they present technical challenges. I believe continuous learning is essential for growth as a programmer.

I actively participate in open-source projects, contributing through documentation, technical support, and feature development. I take pride in collaborating with the open.mp community and maintaining my own projects, such as LongWayDrivers, PAWN Painter, GameText-Plus, and more.
